name: John the Marketing Guy
tag_list: security, marketing, online, social-media, facebook, linked-in, sales, management
description: Marketing Maverick and Manager of Mayhem
overview:
Show me the GAME., Tell me the RULES and we will find a way to WIN.

This has always been my mantra and has always been the way I have came out on top. I was given a gift by God.

Similar to a crystal ball but not a reliable and not as fun as x-ray vision; To take very little and turn it into something grand by seeing things differently than most people see it or choose to see it. No, I’m not bragging I have the history to prove it.

I welcome rejections, thrive in turmoil, challenges only harden my determination to achieve my goal. What makes me different is that I have always been the square peg in a world of round holes! I have a bad case of low T. That’s low tolerance for people that say it cannot be done or it’s has been done. I am addicted to PPC and often overdoes on HWH. Dying to know what PPC is? Got to contact me to find out…three minutes on the phone with me and you’ll know if I am the Marketing Guy for you.

If you are looking for a list of achievements that I have accomplished I can have you call my mom ( she’d love to hear from you) but I am not going to fill this space of all the “stuff” that “diplomas, awards, and certifications I have been awarded of my life.

If you need my mom’s phone number I am glad to give it to you. If you want to skip the four hours on the phone with her. Try Google. Keywords: John Erickson, Atronic Alarms, John the Alarm Guy, John the Marketing Guy, 3 and 2 Baseball of Johnson County. Perry Atha.

Remember we don’t go see people we don’t sell. j.erickson@me.com
